block.p: MANDELBAUM--Frank. On June 7, 2007. Chairman and CEO of Intelli-Check, Inc. Beloved husband of Ann. Loving father of Robert and Jonathan, and David and Amy. Adoring grandfather of Julia and Samuel. Dearest brother of Lance and Ilene. Devoted uncle of Steven and Robyn, and Brian. Caring stepfather of David and Melissa, and Scott and Holly. Service Sunday, 12:45 pm at ''The Riverside'', 76th Street and Amsterdam Ave.
